description: Proposed creation of mansard roof to provide 2 no. additional bedrooms to existing apartment, replacement of windows to front elevation of building and removal of existing overpainting to front facade of building to reveal historic brickwork beneath as public benefit building improvement works.
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; font-family: arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The development and works which provide public benefits in the form of heritage benefits (which help weigh in favour of the approved scheme) as detailed in the approved Design and Access Statement, drawings and documents shall be undertaken prior to occupation of the development.&nbsp; For the avoidance of doubt these are primarily considered to be:</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; font-family: arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><ol style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; font-family: arial, sans-serif; margin-bottom: 0px;"><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The replacement of the uPVC windows with timber sliding sash windows of appropriate design.</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">c.&nbsp; The removal of any redundant satellite dishes which remain on the building.</span></p></li></ol><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-style: normal;">REASON: To ensure that the public benefits, including the heritage benefits, of the approved scheme are secured.</span></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The following elements of the scheme shall not be installed, implemented, or carried out unless in accordance with details that shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details:-</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">etails of all new and replacement sash windows, including</span></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><span>&nbsp;</span>a 1:20 scale elevation drawing of each window type showing the glazing pattern and lintels, and 1:5 scale vertical and horizontal cross-section drawings showing the upper and lower stiles, the meeting rails, the dimensions of the glazing, the profile and dimensions of the glazing bars and spacers (if any);&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; <div style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"><span id="m_-4387530388196656501gmail-docs-internal-guid-f452f3ad-7fff-d45e-4daa-00547fd5e68d"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All repointing shall use a lime-based mortar consisting of 1 part lime to 3 parts sand.&nbsp; Cementitious mortars shall not be used.&nbsp; Pointing shall be in a slightly (2/3mm) recessed style and not flush, bucket handle, ribbon, weatherstruck, or raised pointing.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><br></p></font></span></div><div style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; background-color: transparent; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="background-color: transparent;">REASON: To preserve the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp;</span></span></font></div>

<p>Prior to commencement of development, details of swift bricks/tiles and/or bat boxes to be provided for the scheme where it is considered that there is scope for the introduction of these biodiversity measures shall be submitted to the local planning authority for written approval.&nbsp; The approved scheme of details shall subsequently be incorporated into the development prior to first residential occupation of the development.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON:&nbsp; In the interests of securing a biodiversity net gain for the site.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p>

<p><span style="font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline;">All new and replacement sash windows shall accurately replicate, in terms of material, profile, and detailing, the original windows surviving to the property. They shall be painted timber, double-hung 2/2 sash windows with a slim profile, and narrow integral (not applied) glazing bars with a putty finish (not timber bead). The glazing shall be no greater than 12mm (4mm glass : 4mm gas : 4mm glass) in total thickness.&nbsp;</span>No trickle vents or metallic/perforated spacer bars are permitted.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To preserve the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp;</span></p>
